description: An AVERY file is a printable document that contains one or more labels for printing purpose. It is created with the Avery Design & Print or Design & Print Online software. The labels inside an AVERY file may comprise of different element such as text, graphics, and page layout information. This information is used by printing companies for printing variety of design elements such as business cards, name tags, binder inserts, address labels, disc labels, obituary templates, and greeting cards.
